title: Email Validator - Multiple Formats
description: Master regex by validating phone numbers, URLs, and emails using integrated patterns

functions.name: detectFormat
functions.description: Detect whether input is email, phone, or URL

functions.name: validateAny
functions.description: Return true if input matches any format (email, phone, URL)

functions.name: extractContacts
functions.description: Extract all emails, phones, URLs from text
functions.returns: object with emails, phones, urls arrays

functions.name: formatPhone
functions.description: Convert phone number to standard format: (123) 456-7890

functions.name: normalizePhone
functions.description: Extract only digits from phone, return as string

functions.name: validatePhoneStrict
functions.description: Validate phone with exactly 10 digits (US format only)

functions.name: extractURLDomain
functions.description: Extract domain from URL using capture groups

functions.name: validateContactInfo
functions.description: Validate mixed object with any combo of email, phone, url

parameters.name: contact
parameters.description: Object with optional email, phone, url properties

functions.returns: boolean: true if at least one valid field
